text: I see you've got a stage all set up for us.

text: Yeah, dude. It's all yours!

text: Then, let's rock and roll! Or something simlar.

title: CHEF AID
text: South Park Police Dept. Chef and Garrison now share the same cell

title: CHEF AID
text: And Mr. Twig is at home; he has no idea Mr. Hat is even back. I mean, I care a lot about Mr. Twig, but Mr. Hat and I have so much history.

title: CHEF AID
text: You've finally snapped, huh, Garrison?

title: CHEF AID
text: What?

title: CHEF AID
text: Don't you get it, Garrison? It's all you! You're Mr. Hat and Mr. Twig! You've got split personalities schizophrenic jeebies.

title: CHEF AID
text: I warn you, Chef! Don't even think of taking advantage of me in this prison cell!

title: CHEF AID
text: What??

title: CHEF AID
text: back at Chef Aid. The stage has been reworked with the addition of PA system, drums, floodlights, spotlights

title: CHEF AID
text: Okay. Thanks for coming to Chef Aid, everybody! Are you ready to rock and roll?!  Woo!  All right, let's get things going with Rancid!!  Ran-cid!

title: CHEF AID
text: California sun has sunk

title: CHEF AID
text: back in jail

title: CHEF AID
text: You still aren't entertaining any ideas of raping me here in this prison cell, are you, Chef?

title: CHEF AID
text: No, Garrison! Shut the hell up!

title: CHEF AID
text: Well that's good.

title: CHEF AID
text: What the?!

title: CHEF AID
text: Oh boy, we're free!  Wow, what a daring rescue!  Mr. Hat!  Mr. Hat saved us, Chef!  Come on, let's get in the truck! I'll drive from here, Mr. Hat.

title: CHEF AID
text: How the hell did he reach the gas pedal?

title: CHEF AID
text: Chef Aid. Rick James has just ended a song. The group is now a crowd, cheering the music

title: CHEF AID
text: Mmmmm-mm-mm-mm-mm-mmmm.

title: CHEF AID
text: Rick James, ladies and gentlemen!

title: CHEF AID
text: God bless you, Chef!

title: CHEF AID
text: And now here's your favorite band, Primus! Woo!

title: CHEF AID
text: We're damned proud to be here to support our good buddy, Chef. It was Chef who told us in the early days, to keep trying and to keep pursuing our dreams, no matter how much we sucked. I love that man.

title: CHEF AID
text: Wooo!

title: CHEF AID
text: What are you bastards doing?

title: CHEF AID
text: We are raising money so that Chef can hire Johnny Cochran to sue you!

title: CHEF AID
text: Yeah, now get out of here before I kick you in the nuts!

title: CHEF AID
text: Oh yeah? We'll just see about this!

title: CHEF AID
text: Now here's Joe Strummer! Wooo-hoo!

title: CHEF AID
text: You know, in the Classroom Tour, we lost a beat. Chef would be like it was so offstage going, "Don't forget. Pump your loins, children."  You know, it was like his mo'o, or something.

title: CHEF AID
text: Woo!

title: CHEF AID
text: Well it's a rockin' world, make no mistake about it

title: CHEF AID
role: It's a shockin' world, could be what's so great about it

title: CHEF AID
text: The truck pulls up and Chef exits

title: CHEF AID
role: It's a rockin' world, there ain't nothing fake abou-

title: CHEF AID
text: What the hell is this?

title: CHEF AID
text: Welcome to Chef Aid, Chef.

title: CHEF AID
text: Wow, how'd you get out of jail, Chef?

title: CHEF AID
text: Mr. Hat busted me out. Children, did you do this?

title: CHEF AID
text: Well, we helped.

title: CHEF AID
text: We're gonna raise your money, Chef.

title: CHEF AID
text: I don't believe it!

title: CHEF AID
text: We'll just see how long this Chef Aid thing lasts!

title: CHEF AID
text: And now, here he is. TV's Ozzy Osbourne!

title: CHEF AID
text: We're all here to help our good friend, Chef, who has touched our lives in the past.  I remember when I was just starting out. Chef suggested I buy a pompadour hat. I thought he said, "bite the head off a bat," so I did. And the rest, oh, it's just history. Now, let's go freakeeee!

title: CHEF AID
role: Ain't nowhere to run (come everybody let's)

text: the producer continues sawing. Two of the supports are gone

role: [picks up Kenny and bites into him] Arrrrrrrrgh

title: CHEF AID
text: (All right dude, let me go now)

title: CHEF AID
role: Ozzy	[looks up with a bloody mouth] Yaahhhh! [Kenny's head is
text: missing. The music dies down]

text: Oh my God, Ozzy Osbourne bit Kenny's head off!

title: CHEF AID
text: You bastard!

title: CHEF AID
text: And now here's Ween!

title: CHEF AID
text: We're proud to be a part of Chef Aid.

title: CHEF AID
text: Chef is the guy who told us to do a country album.

title: CHEF AID
text: Whoa, dude, that was Steve's idea.

title: CHEF AID
text: Oh, then. Who's Chef?

title: CHEF AID
text: I don't know, dude. I though you knew him.

title: CHEF AID
text: Oh, well. Anyways, here's our song!

title: CHEF AID
text: Many colors in my homo rainbow

title: CHEF AID
role: Don't be afraid to let your colors shine

title: CHEF AID
text: Don't worry, Mr. Twig. Even though Mr. Hat rescued me from prison, I'm still gonna stick with you.

title: CHEF AID
text: Do you love him?

title: CHEF AID
text: It doesn't matter. He left me.

title: CHEF AID
text: Do you love him?

title: CHEF AID
text: Yes.

title: CHEF AID
text: Then run to him.

title: CHEF AID
text: But I feel like I'd be making the wrong decision.

title: CHEF AID
text: Love isn't a decision, it's a feeling. If we could decide who we love, it would be much simpler, but much less magical.

title: CHEF AID
text: I'll never forget you, Mr. Twig. Thank you.

title: CHEF AID
text: And now, ladies and gentlemen, Mr. Elton John! Woo!

title: CHEF AID
text: Thank you all for coming to help Chef. This is a song written by a veerry special little boy  I have no idea what his name is. Agh, who the hell cares? Anyway, he wrote it for his girlfriend.

title: CHEF AID
role: Wake up, Wendy. Smell the coffee

text: Wendy smiles and looks over at Stan. Stan looks baack

text: Ha haa, you're a wuss.

title: CHEF AID
text: You know I do want you

role: Your flavors smell of peanuts peanuts peanuts

title: CHEF AID
text: the record producer saws yet another support, and this one brings the stage down, with Elton still on it. The lights go out, and the audience is stunned

title: CHEF AID
text: Haa ha ha ha ha. I win. You lose! Chef Aid is over, and you didn't raise near enough money to pay Cochran's legal fees. Ha hahaha I win!

title: CHEF AID
text: And what happened then? Well, in South Park they say , Johnny Cochran's heart grew three sizes that day.

title: CHEF AID
text: Wait!  Mr. Chef, this music has really touched me. I'd like to take up your case, free of charge!

title: CHEF AID
text: You will?

title: CHEF AID
text: I will.

title: CHEF AID
text: YEA!!

title: CHEF AID
text: No!

title: CHEF AID
text: We'll see you in court, Mr. Record Producer.

title: CHEF AID
text: Nooooooooooo!

title: CHEF AID
text: Back to the courthouse. Cochran now prosecutes for Chef, and the record producer has a new lawyer. The boys are now among the obssrvers

title: CHEF AID
text: Ladies and gentlemen of this supposed jury, you must now decide whether or not to reverse the decision for my client, Chef.  I know he seeems guilty, but ladies and gentlemen, this is Chewbacca. Now think about that for one minute: that does NOT MAKE SENSE! Why am I talkin' about Chewbacca when a man's life is on the line?  Why? I tell you why. I don't know. It doesn't make sense. If Chewbacca does not make sense, you must acquit!  Here, look at the monkey. Look at the silly monkey.

title: CHEF AID
text: The courthouse doors open and Chef emerges, with the four boys behind him. Reporters gather around him

title: CHEF AID
text: Chef? How does it feel to be a free man and finally have your name credited on the song, "Stinky Britches"?

title: CHEF AID
text: It feels greaheet! I just can't fuhind the words to thank all the artists who put on Chef Aid. And most of all, I want to thank the children.

title: CHEF AID
text: So, what are you gonna do now?

title: CHEF AID
text: Get back to what's important. It's Tuesday! And that means tomorrow is Tuna Casserole Day.

title: CHEF AID
text: Hooray!
